methods.name: FilterStrings
methods.description: Filter a list of strings in the requested language with rules that match the client.

parameters.name: appid
parameters.description: AppID that is asking to having filtering performed.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: In which language should filtering be performed. If empty, no profanity filtering will be performed.

parameters.name: legal_filtering_country
parameters.description: If set to an ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code that requires legal filtering, that legal filtering will be performed.

parameters.name: raw_strings
parameters.description: The list of strings to be filtered.

parameters.name: is_name
parameters.description: True if the strings are names instead of chat text

parameters.name: steamid
parameters.description: The SteamID of the person viewing the text
